Third Party Content

The Content includes items that have been sourced from third parties as follows:

Xerces 2.8.0

The plug-in is accompanied by software based on Xerces 2.8.0 developed by The Apache Software Foundation as part of the Apache XML project. Therefore:

This product includes software developed by the Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).

The following files contain the Xerces binary code:

  • xercesImpl.jar
  • xmlParserAPIs.jar
  • resolver.jar

and are included without modification.
